attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence in David Cameron
attributes.additional_details: Even though he had no mandate to do so, Prime Minister David Cameron has pushed through Welfare and NHS Reforms that will prove detrimental to many millions of people and indirectly harmful to the country at large. We ask for a Vote of No Confidence in his leadership and that he must step down from his role as Prime Minister.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
